Package emissary.directory

Class DirectoryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • emissary.directory.DirectoryAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectoryObserver, PeerObserver, PlaceObserver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WorkSpace.WorkSpaceDirectoryWatcher
    public class DirectoryAdapter
extends Object
implements PeerObserver, PlaceObserver
    This class implements all of the emissary.directory.DirectoryPlace observer interfaces with null implementations so that it is easy to extend and just provide behaviour for the methods of interest.
